mapper.select: select tb.id, tb.player_id, tb.instance_id, tb.challenge_date, tb.current_floor, tb.success_flag, tb.complete_flag, tb.create_by, tb.create_time, tb.update_by, tb.update_time, tb.del_flag from tb_instance_record tb left join tb_account_player ap on ap.id = tb.player_id where challenge_date = now() and instance_id = #{instanceId} and tb.complete_flag = false and ap.account_id = #{accountId}
